publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2437 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Clocks in the Chamberâ€”That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body should review the positioning of clocks in the chamber by seeking the views of members in respect of whether they are able to see the clocks from all positions in the chamber and that where the members indicate "blind spots" the matter should be resolved.
S2M-2437 Clocks in the Chamber (lodged on 16 February 2005) Donald Gorrie*
